advice.message:
Please edit the pg_hba.conf file on server to allow access from current host.
  • Please edit this file and add the current host IP with the postgres user.
    To enable all hosts to connect add: host all all 0.0.0.0/0 md5
  • Restart the server ( 'pg_ctl.exe -D <path_to_data_folder> restart' ).
Further details in help.
